comment._content: This is now a part of a Hotel built during the Celtic tiger ,opened for a short while and closed shortly after by the Banks!

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/68172694@N05] Thanks for that - what a shame! Is it still closed for the foreseeable? And can you remember the name of the hotel?
